directions.step:
I usually sprinkle a little extra Parmesan cheese and some paprika on the top.
Combine everything (I put this is a quiche dish or pie plate) and bake at 350 degrees for about 30 minutes, or until bubbly and the top starts to lightly brown.
I serve it with Wheat Thins crackers.
This is ALWAYS the first dish gone at parties.
EAT-L Digest 25 June 1996
From the EAT-L recipe list. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
